name: head-charge
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavor_text.black_white: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. It also damages the user a little.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. It also damages the user a little.
